EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us Next Week at Cloud Foundry Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cloud Foundry Summit North America is around the corner and we want you to be there!
As software transforms industries across the world, more companies are embracing software as core competency to differentiate themselves with customers and capture new opportunities. But how do you get there? What technology and cultural best practices should you adopt?
Join us <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/community/summits/program/about/?summitId=10016]]>, and more than 1,500 developers, operators and managers leveraging the industry's leading open source Cloud Native platform, to answer those questions and so much more. Below are a few highlights - we hope to see you in Santa Clara next week!
Register today <[[https://www.regonline.com/register/checkin.aspx?EventId=1807244&MethodId=0&EventSessionId=&startnewreg=1&_ga=1.261091211.740282943.1461273510]]> and use the Pivotal discount code CFNA16PIV250 to get $250 off your Cloud Foundry Summit pass. Learn from Cloud Leaders
Stanley Chan, Chief Architect, Systems, Visa Lessons Learned from Managing Docker Containers Inside a Cloud Foundry PaaS
Paul Maritz, Executive Chairman of the Board, Pivotal and Sam Ramji, CEO, Cloud Foundry Foundation Fireside Chat
Simon Johansson, Platform Engineer, Springer Nature and Daniel Otte, Head of Platform Engineering, Springer Nature From Weeks to Minutes
Ken Owens, CTO, Cloud Infrastructure Services, Cisco Cloud Native Transformation: The Journey Begins Here!
In addition to these featured speakers, you will hear from industry leaders, Cloud Foundry developers and operators, and other dedicated community members.
View the full schedule and lineup of speakers. <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/ogram-schedule--summitId-10016/35bzpt/705994090]]> Full Day Training Workshops On Monday, there will be three full-day training workshops provided by Altoros, Pivotal, and Stark & Wayne. Developers who want to learn how to deploy innovative, microservice-based systems in the cloud, be sure to sign up for Microservices on Cloud Foundry: Going Cloud Native <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/ogram-training--summitId-10016/35bzq1/705994090]]>. Space is very limited so register ASAP! Additional workshops include “Cloud Foundry for Beginners: From Zero to Hero” and “Operating a Platform: BOSH and Everything Else”. Learn more and register <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/ogram-training--summitId-10016/35bzq1/705994090]]>. BOSH BOSH BOSH Due to popular demand from the Cloud Foundry community, the Summit organizers have arranged an addition to this year’s Cloud Foundry Summit: a technical day focused on BOSH <[[http://go.linuxfoundation.org/e/6342/h-training-day--summitId-10016/35bzq3/705994090]]>. BOSH is the powerful orchestration tool that lies at the heart of Cloud Foundry. We’re especially excited about this one and hope you can join Pivotal there. Add this event on Thursday, May 26 to your schedule for only $99.
- Introduction from Sam Ramji, CEO, Cloud Foundry Foundation - Keynote from Dr Nic Williams, Stark & Wayne - Keynote from Matt Reider, Pivotal
Register today <[[https://www.regonline.com/register/checkin.aspx?EventId=1807244&MethodId=0&EventSessionId=&startnewreg=1&_ga=1.261091211.740282943.1461273510]]> and use the code CFNA16PIV250 to get $250 off your Cloud Foundry Summit pass.
We hope to see you there!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
